box_title: How to separate your Apple media after a divorce | iMore
box_description: Connect your external drive to the computer you're moving the files from. Click the Finder icon in the dock to open a new Finder window. Click Music . Double-click the iTunes folder. Double-click the iTunes Media folder. Double-click the Music folder. Select the folders for the artists or albums that you want to copy over. Click and drag those files over to your external drive . This should only copy the files to the drive, not move them out of the computer's library. Eject the drive from the older Mac.

title: Need separate Apple ID accounts do to div - Apple Community
description: Question: Q: Need separate Apple ID accounts do to divorce I am going through a divorce and need to know how to handle the apple id account and not cause my spouse to lose aps and music purchased. But we need separate billing.

title: How can I divorce a phone from my ex and change the Apple ID ...
description: Is there anyway I can divorce this phone from my ex, sign it in under my own apple id, download the games he liked the best under my nickel, and let my kid play his games? He already doesn't understand what's going on, I'd like to at least give him back his favorite games... thanks, frustrated momma

title: Use your own Apple ID for Family Sharing - Apple Support
description: Jan 16, 2020   Your Apple ID is the account you use to access all Apple services, including Family Sharing.Everyone in your family needs to join Family Sharing using their own Apple ID. . This way your family can share purchases, an Apple Music family plan, iCloud storage, photos, and more without sharing personal information like email, text messages, or passwor

title: How a Divorcing Spouse Can Spy on You Using Your iPhone
description: Because of the divorce, you should enable two-step authentication. With your iPhone, sign in with your Apple ID, go to Password and then Security, from there, follow the instructions at the top of the page. A shared iCloud account with your spouse, however, is something two-factor authentication will not cure alone.

title: 10 Tech Issues to Consider If Youre Going Through a Divorce ...
Family Sharing and Apple ID for your child - Apple Support
description: Dec 16, 2019   Family Sharing and Apple ID for your child With Family Sharing, you can create an Apple ID for a child under 13.* This allows them to participate in Family Sharing and use other Apple services such as iCloud, iMessage, FaceTime, and Game Center.

title: Divorce App on the App Store - iTunes - Apple
description: The Divorce App is based on Dr. Woliver's book Mango Season Doesn't Last Forever: A Guide to Helping Children Cope with Divorce. Dr. Woliver brings 25 years of experience working with children of divorce. The Divorce App helps you ensure that your child not only survives the divorce, but also grows positively from the experience.

title: Divorcing and needing to separate Apple ID : apple
description: Assuming it's an Apple Music account, it's attached to the Apple ID that owns it. You can try to do a family account, but I doubt that's ideal given the divorce. Same for music you purchased. If it was purchased on your Apple ID, it's yours and no one elses.

title: Leave Family Sharing - Apple Support
description: Jan 15, 2020   When you leave Family Sharing, your Apple ID is removed from the family group and you won't have access to any services shared by your family. This might include an Apple Music family subscription or a shared iCloud storage plan. You stop sharing locations with your family members and your devices are removed from the family Find My iPhone list.

title: Splitting a shared Apple ID/iCloud account amongst two or ...
description: Nov 03, 2015   Splitting a shared Apple ID/iCloud account amongst two or more users. 3 November 2015, 04:54. Once upon a time people would create a single Apple ID and share it amongst family and friends. In other words, EVERYBODY logged into their iPhone or iPad using the same Apple ID.

title: Le Divorce on iTunes - Apple
description: Le Divorce follows the journey of Isabel Walker (Kate Hudson), a quintessential young Californian newly arrived in the City of Light to visit her pregnant sister, Roxanne (Naomi Watts). A darkly romantic poet, Roxy has just been jilted by her scoundrel husband, Charles-Henri de Persand, and it appears they are headed for "le divorce."

title: Divorce Story on Apple Podcasts
description: Apr 28, 2020   Divorce Story would have been a great source of information, especially late at night. I found myself nodding, smiling, reliving the highs, pain and despair I felt. Everyone has their own unique story, talking, listening and sharing stories definitely helps, so thank you. Divorce is very hard emotionally & financially. So is navigating the new you.

title: amicable divorce on the App Store - iTunes - Apple
description: Download amicable divorce and enjoy it on your iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch. amicable is the simplest, fastest way to collect, share and communicate essential divorce information with your ex. Save thousands of pounds in legal fees by creating your own parenting plans, financial arrangements and settlements.

title: Families - Apple
description: Get everyone started with an Apple ID. The first step to sharing is making sure each family member has an Apple ID. That way you all have your own private logins, and everyones info stays separate. Its fast and easy  parents can even set one up for kids under 13.

title: Legal Process Guidelines - Apple Inc.
description: Legal Process Guidelines Government & Law Enforcement within the United States These guidelines are provided for use by government and law enforcement agencies within the United States when seeking information from Apple Inc. (Apple) about users of Apples devices, products and services. Apple will update these Guidelines as necessary.
